feed.title: Stumbling into a contentious soft fork activation attempt

entry.title: Stumbling into a contentious soft fork activation attempt
entry.summary: The email context is regarding a mistake made by the sender, ZmnSCPxj, in an offlist email to Prayank. ZmnSCPxj apologizes for accidentally pressing "Reply All" instead of "Reply". The context does not provide any further information or details on the matter.
